title: Lamb.of.God-As.The.Palaces.Burn[2003][MP3][320Kbps]-Magik
description:
Lamb of God - As The Palaces Burn [2003]
========================================

Released: May 6, 2003
Genre:    Death Metal
Length:   38:06
Label:    Prosthetic Records
Producer: Devin Townsend

Track listing:
==============

   1. Ruin ? 3:55
   2. As the Palaces Burn ? 2:24
   3. Purified ? 3:11
   4. 11th Hour ? 3:44
   5. For Your Malice ? 3:43
   6. Boot Scraper ? 4:34
   7. A Devil In God&#039;s Country ? 4:11
   8. In Defense of Our Good Name ? 3:14
   9. Blood Junkie ? 4:23
  10. Vigil ? 4:42


As the Palaces Burn is the second album of Virginian metal band Lamb of God, released under Prosthetic Records in 2003. As the Palaces Burn received considerably more airplay than their previous efforts, with three singles. The album was produced by Chris Adler, Mark Morton, Shaun Thingvold and Devin Townsend. The album has sold over 200,000 copies in the U.S.
